Package api.basecamp

Class Summary
Account Account Object for use with BaseCamp API
BCAuth Object used to Authenticate with BaseCamp
Categories Collection of BaseCamp Category Objects
Category  
Comment Comment Object for use with BaseCamp API
Comments Collection of BaseCamp Comment Objects
Companies Collection of BaseCamp Company Objects
Company Company Object for use with BaseCamp API
ElementValue Static Class to process XML Elements
Message BaseCamp Message Object
Messages Collection of BaseCamp Company Objects
Milestone Comment Object for use with BaseCamp API
Milestones Collection of BaseCamp Milestone Objects
People Collection of BaseCamp People Objects
Person Person Object for use with BaseCamp API
Project Project Object for use with BaseCamp API
Projects Collection of BaseCamp Project Objects
TimeEntry TimeEntry Object for use with BaseCamp API
TimeReport Collection of BaseCamp TimeEntry Objects with the ability to define reports.
TimeReportSpec Object used for spending report specifications to a TimeReport
